import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect} from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Home from "assets/icon/home.svg"; import Phone from "assets/icon/phone.png"; import Twitter from "assets/icon/Twitter"; import { SvgIcon } from '@material-ui/core'; const useStyles = makeStyles({ // #FFAC62 // #1E6F79 container: { height: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#1E6F79' }, titleContainer: { display: 'flex', paddingTop: '5vh', height: '10vh', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#FFAC62', }, address: { position: 'absolute', marginTop: '20vh', marginLeft: '10vw', height: '10vh', flex: '1', flexDirection: 'vertical', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, homeIcon: { height: '100px', color: '#FFAC62', padding: '10px', fontSize: '80px' }, Icon: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', border: '2px solid #FFAC62', borderRadius: '50%', height: '15vh', width: '7vw', margin: '0 0 2vh 3vw', }, homeText: { color: '#FFAC62', flex: '1', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', width: '15vw', fontSize: '2vh' }, phone: { position: 'absolute', marginTop: '20vh', marginLeft: '40vw', height: '10vh', flex: '1', flexDirection: 'vertical', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, email: { position: 'absolute', marginTop: '20vh', marginLeft: '70vw', height: '10vh', flex: '1', flexDirection: 'vertical', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, social: { position: 'absolute', marginTop: '60vh', marginLeft: '10vw', height: '20vh', width: '10vw', backgroundColor: 'tarnsparent', border: '2px solid #FFAC62', borderRadius: '50%', zIndex: '1000' }, socialOver: { position: 'absolute', marginTop: '60vh', marginLeft: '10vw', height: '20vh', width: '10vw', backgroundColor: '#FFAC62', border: '5px solid #FFAC62', borderRadius: '50%', transform: 'scale(0)', transition: '1s ease-in-out', zIndex: '100', }, }); const twitterStyle = () => { return ( {color: '#FFAC62', flex: '1', flexDirection: 'vertical', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', marginLeft: '1.5vw', marginTop: '2.5vh' } ); } export default function SectionPatreon(props) { const classes = useStyles();
